### Total Alignment Score Calculation:
The total alignment score is calculated by averaging the scores of all individual elements:
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{\sum \text{Element Scores}}{\text{Number of Elements}} = \frac{1.0 + 1.0 + 1.0 + 0.0 + 0.0 + 0.0}{6} = \frac{3.0}{6} = 0.5 \]
